# How to powercycle Cozmo {#how-to-powercycle-cozmo .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

If you are having an issue with Cozmo, power-cycling him may help
resolve the issue. Step-by-step \"how to power-cycle Cozmo\" guidelines
are provided below.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
# My Cozmo has a backpack button

1.  Take Cozmo off his charging platform
2.  Press and hold his backpack button for 5 seconds
3.  Place Cozmo back on his charging platform
:::

::: sections
![](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d768f04286364bc975b70/img-2828-1585280654-621923590.gif)

# My Cozmo does not have a backpack button

1.  Take Cozmo off his charging platform

2.  Unplug the adapter from the socket but leave the USB cable plugged
    into the adapter

3.  Place Cozmo on his charging platform and wait until his light goes
    off

4.  Take Cozmo off his charging platform again

5.  Plug the adapter back into the socket

6.  Place Cozmo back on his charging platform

    ![](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d76902c7d3a7e9ae9e284/img-2828-1585280654-1173388531.gif)
:::
